requirements.summary: Promote draft version 73 to the live/production channel via release metadata only (no frontend source changes).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/.release/production-version.txt` contains exactly `73` as the promoted production draft version.
No files under `frontend/src/` are modified as part of this promotion.
After deployment, end users are served draft version 73 in the live/production channel.

file_operations.description: Set/confirm the promoted production draft version to `73` (metadata-only promotion per `frontend/.release/README.md`); do not modify any files under `frontend/src/`.
